description: Episode of Series "Focus on behaviour: the science of psychology". The ways in which psychologists are studying, in the laboratory of Dr. Robert Sears at Stanford University, the growth and development of personality and emotional behaviour in children. The roles portrayed by Eddie, his mother and father are re-enactments based on actual research and findings in Dr Sears' experiment.
